page.title: 10Our Vicar
page.content: Our{Vicar}is called Rev.G.Deacon.He lives along the Harley Road in Cressage Vicarage, with his wife. Being a vicar means that he can {baptise, marry and bury}people, and can{celebrate Holy Communion.}Most of his time is taken up in{visiting the {sick}and{taking services. Mr. Deacon visits{eleven churches}in the Wenlock area, they are all in his care.They are Much Wenlock, Shipton, Sheinton, Harley, Stanton Long, Easthope, Church Preen, Hughley, Kenley, Cressage and Bourton. He takes{Confirmation Classes}every Friday from 4.30pm-5.30pm.These are to prepare people for full membership of the church. He takes a maximum of twenty services a week. During Mr Deacon's {spare time,}he does gardening. Before he was a vicar he was a{farmer.
